start:
Welcome to the official Waves.Exchange Telegram bot. Waves.Exchange is a hybrid crypto assets exchange that allows users to transfer, trade, issue and stake cryptocurrencies. The platform combines the security of decentralized systems with features and advantages of conventional centralized exchanges.
    Take part in our super combo: get 1 USDN cashback for staking 10 USDN + a weekly draw for 100 USDN!"
    To participate you must complete the following steps:
    1. Buy at least 10 USDN using your card here: https://waves.exchange/staking
    2. Stake at least 10 USDN purchased with the card before April 20, 11:00 (UTC +3)
    3. Click the â€œParticipate" button under this message.
    After registration, you will receive 1 USDN cashback for each Waves account with 10 USDN within 24 hours. In addition, we will hold a 100 USDN prize draw every week for the entire month. Letâ€™s go!
address: Enter your address on the Waves.Exchange to participate in the cashback campaign and the 100 USDN draw
invalidAddress: The address does not exist or is entered incorrectly. Please try again.
notEnoughMoney: You have not purchased USDN with a card. This is a mandatory condition for participation. Please try again.
stakeRequired: Your address does not have any staked USDN or there are less than 10 USDN locked in staking. Please try again.
congratulations: You have successfully registered for the Waves.Exchange contest and cashback campaign! You should receive your bonus soon, and the first winner will be announced in a week! Stay in touch!
alreadyParticipating: You are already registered in the cashback campaign. The next 100 USDN prize draw will happen within a week!
